title: Freelancer.com Jobs Scraper
description: Extract freelance job listings from Freelancer.com. Search by category, keyword, or provide a custom URL. Supports automatic pagination and detailed job data extraction.

startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: Start scraping from a specific Freelancer.com jobs URL (e.g., https://www.freelancer.com/jobs/seo). If provided, this overrides keyword/category.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job search keyword or skill (e.g., 'SEO', 'Web Development', 'Graphic Design'). Used for filtering results.

category.title: Job Category
category.description: Freelancer.com job category slug (e.g., 'seo', 'web-development', 'graphic-design'). Browse categories at freelancer.com/jobs.

jobType.title: Job Type
jobType.description: Filter by job type: 'all', 'fixed' (fixed price projects), or 'hourly' (hourly projects).

minBudget.title: Minimum Budget
minBudget.description: Minimum project budget in USD (optional filter).

maxBudget.title: Maximum Budget
maxBudget.description: Maximum project budget in USD (optional filter).

sortBy.title: Sort Results By
sortBy.description: Sort job listings by relevance, newest first, or budget.

collectDetails.title: Extract Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Enable to visit each job page and extract complete descriptions, skills, client info, and more. Disabling this speeds up scraping but returns limited data.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract. Set to higher values to collect more data.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on the number of listing pages to crawl. Prevents excessive scraping.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Proxy settings for Freelancer.com. Residential proxies recommended for best results and to avoid blocks.

dedupe.title: Remove Duplicates
dedupe.description: Automatically remove duplicate job listings based on URL.

requestDelay.title: Request Delay (ms)
requestDelay.description: Minimum delay between requests in milliseconds. Higher values help avoid rate limiting but slow down scraping.

useApiFirst.title: Use API Strategy First
useApiFirst.description: Attempt to use Freelancer.com's internal API for faster data retrieval before falling back to HTML scraping.
